1) Based upon the FDA (EUA) documents: 

–There is no statistical reduction in COVID rates.
–There’s no statistical reduction in COVID death rates.
–There’s an unacceptable VAERS death and adverse event rates.
Congratulations, you now did the scientific review that the FDA didn't.

COVID-19 Vaccine efficacy & Effectiveness

Relative risk vs Absolute risk.
There's really an efficacy ranging from 0.8% to 1.3%
